description: Manju Mahli’s easy version of this Indian dessert makes a wonderful dip for strawberries - the saffron turns the dessert a beautiful shade of pale yellow gold.

default: 150g/5oz Greek-style yoghurt or low-fat crème fraîche

steps: Place the saffron into a cup with the milk and leave it to soak for a couple of minutes
Whisk together the yoghurt (or crème fraîche), cream, honey and nutmeg in a separate bowl.
Gently stir the milk and saffron into the yoghurt mixture.
To serve, dip the strawberries into the shrikhand.
title: Strawberry saffron dip (shrikhand)
